executiveSummary: Ben and Melissa from Caddyy Swag pitched their product, the Par 6 cooler, on Shark Tank, seeking $60,000 for 20% equity. The Par 6 is a compact golf bag cooler designed to keep six cans cold without ice. Despite a detailed presentation, all Sharks declined to invest, citing limited market potential and strong existing competition.
keyDecisions: All Sharks declined to invest in Caddyy Swag.
nextSteps: Ben and Melissa will continue selling the Par 6 cooler independently, focusing on existing markets and self-driven sales without Shark investment.
